scripts.create:ibmcloud: npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && ibmcloud fn action create facility/getCoordinatesByAddress --kind nodejs:12 dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy:ibmcloud: ibmcloud fn action update facility/getCoordinatesByAddress --kind nodejs:12 dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run deploy:ibmcloud
scripts.invoke:action: ibmcloud fn action invoke --result facility/getCoordinatesByAddress --param address 'via Paolo Fabbri 43, Bologna'
